name: neon racer (Ricardo milos)
description:
neon racer is a racing game where you have to doge randomly genarated obstecles with an awsome soundtrack this game is highly recomended to play with sound on this game is verry short but its so addicting you will find yourself playing it multiple times since every run is different from the last if you like this game and want to support me you can donate or simply play another game i hope you enjoy my game (:

another thing is the app version of this game is better than the web version 

credits for music

act 6 of hotline miami 2
